title: My client is shut down by bug, so i got leaverbuster.
body:
I was loading my client and it crash. So I report the bug and reconnect my game. But my teammate start the remake and I got punishment.
If riot saw this discussion I wish my punishment remove.

replies.body:
Sorry to hear your game crashed, but I'd like to help!  We can't remove the leaverbuster queue, but I'd like to help troubleshoot the crash.  Leaverbuster treats everyone equally because all leaves still cause other players a negative experience, and it wouldn't occur unless you have a history of leaving. 

It sounds like you're having bugspalt errors, which can happen if drivers or game files fail to render the game.  Go through our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help fix that up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
